org.eclipse.persistence.tools.tuning
Class SafeModeTuner

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.persistence.tools.tuning.SafeModeTuner
All Implemented Interfaces:
SessionTuner
public class SafeModeTuner
extends java.lang.Object
implements SessionTuner

Configures the persistence unit for debugging. This disables caching and several performance optimizations. The purpose is to provide a simplified debugging and development configuration.

Constructor Summary
SafeModeTuner()
           
 
Method Summary
 void tuneDeploy(Session session)
          Allow any Session configuration to be tune after meta-data has been processed, but before connecting the session.
